data.summary: I'm a software engineer, currently working in Mountain View, California. I have around eight years of experience in commercial software development using various programming languages and platforms. My primary skill is web application development using Java on server side but also have a strong background in .NET/C#. I'm an enthusiast of continuous integration, test first, and agile environments. I like working on scalability, performance, design, and great user experiences.

item.name: FirstRain Orion
item.description: an analytics platform that brings together external and internal unstructured data to coach teams and professionals on key business developments that affect their go-to-market strategy, business relationships, and investments.

item.name: Ooyala Backlot
item.description: a modular, full-featured video solution used by some of the largest companies in the world.

item.position: Contractor Senior Java Developer at Google

item.name: DoubleClick Data Platform API
item.description: A centralized hub for the origination and sharing of 1st party data and licensing of 3rd­party data. DDP API is taking care of distribution of that information across various Google advertising products
item.environment: Java, Google F1 database, Stubby RPC, protocol buffers, Guice, Google cloud

item.name: DoubleClick Data Platform UI
item.description: An interactive Web application which allows data providers to browse, create and manage data segments, sell segments with to advertisers and manage these shares.
item.environment: Java, GWT, Servlets, Stubby RPC, protocol buffers, Gin

item.name: DCLK QPS
item.description: A web service which allows to set up and enforce publisher apps load management rules.
item.environment: Java, Spring, Jetty, JDBC, HSQLDB, MySql

item.name: Report Manager
item.description: Web application which allows fund administrators to configure and maintain client portals providing access to information on investments to the funds' clients. Works as a single location for viewing all fund reports existing in Paladyne Suite.
item.environment: ASP.NET WebForms, Silverlight 4.0, ExtJS 3.3, HTML, CSS, WCF, MS SQL Server 2008, Visual Studio 2010, IIS7.0, Team Foundation Server 2010

item.name: Web Sales Manager
item.description: Web application based on ASP.NET MVC framework. Web Sales Manager provides the option pricing functions for the European energy markets.
item.environment: ASP.NET MVC, C#, Java, Hibernate, JavaScript, jQuery, jQuery UI, HTML, CSS, MS SQL Server 2008, Visual Studio 2008, LINQ, IIS, Team Foundation Server 2008

item.name: TyMetrix 360°
item.description: CT TyMetrix 360° is an integrated platform combining e-Billing, matter management, document management, financial reporting, budgeting and forecasting. Very large project including about two millions line of code.
item.environment: ASP.NET WebForms, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MS SQL Server 2008, Visual Studio 2008, XML, LINQ, IIS, Team Foundation Server 2008

item.name: Internal geoinformation system.
item.description: Two-tier application which provides ability to view and edit geographic information, including streets, buildings.
item.environment: WinForms, C#, MS SQL Server 2005, Visual Studio 2005, Visual SourceSafe

item.name: Network equipment monitoring system.
item.description: Distributed system which is responsible for real-time monitoring of network devices.
item.environment: WinForms, C#, MS SQL Server 2005, Visual Studio 2005, Visual SourceSafe

skills.item: ASP.NET WebForms, MVC, WCF, NInject, Unity IoC

item.name: Databases
item.other: a also worked with CouchDb, Oracle
